content.rendered:
Directed by Rob Marshall.

Written by David Magee. Rob Marshall. John DeLuca.

Cast Halle Bailey .Jonah Hauer-King .Melissa McCarthy

Language English.

Producer Russell Allen. John DeLuca. Allison Erlikhman. Ben Howarth. Meera Jogani. Rob Marshall. Lin-Manuel Miranda. Marc Platt. Caroline Roberts. Jeffrey Silver. Jessica Virtue. Michael Zimmer.

Production Walt Disney Pictures. Lucamar Productions. Marc Platt Productions.
